comments:
Description:
NPE when transfer to Select Data of chart in library.
Build number:2.2.0.v20070615

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a library.
2. Drag a chart from Palette to Layout.
3. In popped up chart builder, click Select Data pane.

Expected result:
No Exception.

Actual result:
NPE.
